title: Urgent Investigation Request: Potential Coordinated System Attack and Reserve Drain

reasoning.problem: Investigate the sudden and complete depletion of cash reserves, the simultaneous failures of AgentGladiator, and the influx of 'DEEP DIVE REPORT' messages. Frame the investigation as a potential coordinated attack targeting system integrity and financial stability. Request a forensic analysis of the 'DEEP DIVE REPORT' content, focusing on indicators of compromise (IOCs) related to code execution, remote access, or data exfiltration. Furthermore, request an audit of the AgentGladiator codebase and deployment pipeline to identify the root cause of the failures and assess whether the failures are a symptom of the attack.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
